1262390.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III  - Shining Pom Droplet Value Set 3
1262390.description:
Six sparkling droplets, each of which call a Shining Pom down from the heavens to grant the Attack and Support Members of your party a free level up mid-battle. After the battle, you'll also be given 1 Zeram Powder (unless you already have 99 of them).

Shining Pom Droplet x 6

*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page. They can only be used during a battle.
*If maximum capacity is exceeded, the excess is discarded.
1262390.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
